response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a great addition to your collection or business. Given its importance to me, I am offering it to you at an exceptional price of $950,000. Considering its worth to you is $800,000, this offer presents a unique opportunity for both parties.

Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. I am looking forward to the possibility of working with you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
